51  |  WorkforceDiversity, Equity and Inclusion Progress  
ArcBest is committed to creating a workplace that embraces 
all cultures, perspectives and experiences and building a more 
inclusive place for all. In October 2020, we began working with a 
leading DEI firm to help in our efforts to assess the current state 
of DEI across the organization, align our DEI vision and gather 
employee feedback through focus groups.
In December, we announced our three-year strategy roadmap, 
centering around four key areas:
• Workforce — Attracting talented candidates at diverse 
institutions and developing and retaining underrepresented 
employees at all levels 
• Workplace — Creating an environment where employees feel 
included and have ways to succeed and connect; this also 
includes delivering ongoing DEI education resources 
• Marketplace — Partnering with diverse vendors, owner-
operators and carriers
• Community — Formalizing employee volunteering and
